Text: Based on recently-reported public pension assets and estimated liabilities, that figure is now more than $1.109 trillion, an increase of $56 billion. That translates into $81,300 of pension debt per California household.
Cause: Based on recently-reported public pension assets and estimated liabilities, that figure is now more than $1.109 trillion, an increase of $56 billion.
Effect: That translates into $81,300 of pension debt per California household.
Sentence: <e1>Based on recently-reported public pension assets and estimated liabilities, that figure is now more than $1.109 trillion, an increase of $56 billion.</e1> <e2>That translates into $81,300 of pension debt per California household.</e2>
